```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
## Load data
```{r}
fish <- read.csv("data/Gaeta_etal_CLC_data.csv")
```

## Variables Lakeid and Length
```{r}
#can say names(fish) first to find the names if needed
fishlength <- select(fish, "lakeid", "length")
fishlength
```

## Filter lake BO
```{r}
fish_bo <- filter(fish, lakeid == "BO")
fish_bo
```

## Mean of fish from lake BO
```{r}
mean(fish_bo$length)
```
